summary: AN ORDINANCE making an appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund for certain necessary preliminary expenses of the Engineering Department for the proposed improvement of A Sanitary Sewer System to be known as the Lawton Wood Sanitary Sewer System, Capital Improvement Program No. 12-0024, as contemplated in Resolution No. 24917, or as amended, and providing for reimbursement if such local improvement district is formed.
